nodes.text: Yaove Gunsmiths was an arms manufacturer that produced the 88i twin light blaster cannon. During the Imperial Era, the All Terrain Scout Transport manufactured by Kuat Drive Yards for the Galactic Empire came equipped with an 88i blaster cannon on the left side of its command module.
Yaove Gunsmiths was first mentioned in the 2016 reference book written by Michael Kogge that was included with the Star Wars: Rogue One: AT-ACT Deluxe Book and 3D Wood Model .
